info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 10:40PM CDT until April 13 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WALKER...NORTHEASTERN TUSCALOOSA...WESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 1040 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oakman to 7 miles east of Binion Creek Landing, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Hueytown, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Pleasant Grove, Adamsville, Graysville, Sylvan Springs, Parrish, Oakman, Maytown, West Jefferson, North Johns, Gorgas Steam Plant, Bull City, Gorgas, Boley Springs, Concord, Burnwell and Beloit. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
